markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tongue Disarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=2408) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 46 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); [Lightning Tongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=2403)

</column>

---

You lash out with your tongue to disarm your foe. You attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a creature within 10 feet, ignoring the requirement that you must have at least one hand free.
name: Tongue Disarm
